content: **kitty lovey** i made this lovey for my daughters as a softy to sleep with super soft and cuddly kitty is the perfect toy in little hands the lovey measures 15cm from head to toe using the recommended yarn note this pattern only works with plush yarn only use acrylic or cotton yarn to assemble the parts **what you will need ** 3 5mm crochet hook size d plush yarn alize velluto o 1x pink 20g o 1x white 20g cotton yarn for embroidery and assembly catania originals o white o black o pink o yellow 10mm safety eyes polyester filling **a minta magyarul is elérhető **
